title: Developing Scaffolding Strategies for e-Textbook Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: A course strengthening competency in designing digital textbooks through learning map-based scaffolding in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners will be able to systematically design the learning flow of digital textbooks using learning maps
Learners will be able to apply at least three types of digital resource templates suitable for science-based digital textbooks
Based on learner analysis results, learners will be able to propose at least two scaffolding strategies within digital textbooks

resources: Digital resource library for science disciplines
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
